titleStmt.title: An abstract of all such acts of Parliament, now in force, as relate to the admiralty and navy of England
Public General Acts. Selections: Royal Navy
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by S. Bridge in Austin Friers,

notesStmt.note: Leaves A1, A8, N6-8, and every even-numbered leaf from sig. B onwards are blank. Odd numbered leaves are paginated: 1-2, 3-4, ... .
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
